note: Narrow, jet-like CME firs seen to the SW by SOHO LASCO C2 beginning at 2025-10-27T14:36Z, as well as by SOHO LASCO C3, STEREO A COR2 and GOES CCOR-1 in later frames. The source of this event is a minor eruption from Active Region 14256 (S16W77) beginning at approx. 2025-10-27T14:17Z as seen by GOES SUVI and STEREO A EUVI 304, along with field line opening seen in GOES SUVI 195 in the same timeframe.
